channel.title: RUA Rules Of Autoing!
channel.description:
Well I found some rules for autoing on the SRL Forums. So I wanted to write some out in my own words. EDIT - Thanks Greeny :) Have you ever wanted an autoing army? Have you got one? You need to read the rules of autoing! [center][size=35pt].::Golden Rules For Autoing::.[/size][/center] [size=15pt]1#[/size] [b]Respect Jagex.[/b]
This community respects Jackex. We enjoy playing their game, not for the game, but for the intellectual challenge. We play somewhat different than legitimite players, but we try to act natural.
[size=20pt]2#[/size] [b]Thou shall take care of his autoing army.[/b]
Cherish your players. Treat your players with respect, treat them as individuals. They are your Army, they work for you. Don't leave them unattended.
[size=15pt]3#[/size] [b]Switch players often[/b] If you switch players 30 minutes to 45 minutes, you won't get so many randoms! [size=15pt]4#[/size] [b]Is my Army an [i]army[/i]?[/b] Make sure you have more than 15 players to auto on, It's not really an autoing army if you have 5> players to run on. [size=15pt]5#[/size] [b]Try to stay on-line as long as possible[/b] Don't you just love scripts that go on for 24+ hours? Try to keep autoing for as long as possible. but not up to the point until you think that you should stop to keep accounts safe [size=15pt]6#[/size] [b]Create your own!![/b] You know if you want to have a good autoing army that makes you millions and none are banned, your gonna need some good scripts right? If you use other peoples scripts there going to stop updating, the script will brake, or it will get outdated. Learn SCAR and then you can have an army of scripts! Don't forget to release previous versions! You could become a great SCAR scripter! [size=20pt]7#[/size] [b]Learn from your mistakes[/b] Most people say this but you have to learn from your mistakes, you could of fucked up in scripting a script, getting one line wrong could fuck your autoing up! I don't mean an error in a script but something that's old and outdated, it might work but it could be detectable. [size=15pt]8#[/size] [b]Use more Computers![/b] Try to use multiple computers, if you only have 1 good one of your own then install VM ware and auto with tin xp! (I'll make a tutorial soon) Multiple computers means multiple scripts, more scripts means more accounts! SCAR would boot aryan off the ledge! [size=15pt]9#[/size] [b]Keep up-to-date![/b] If a new version of SCAR comes out, install it, don't delete the previous version you might need it! If a new SRL comes out, INSTALL IT! Update your scripts constantly so if your using low version of things and poor scripts you can only get better. [size=15pt]10#[/size] [b]Have fun![/b] Remember why we're here? We're here to have fun, auto, play runescape, do what you want with SCAR but remember runescape needs you! :)

item.title: RUA Rules Of Autoing!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Pretty pointless, it’s not like they don’t know about us.

I think it started after they used the old trademark ruse on Nick for Nick’s Autominer, saying he couldn’t use their name on his website, so he started referring to them as THE COMPANY, and everyone else just called them Fagex or Xegaj

Read full topic

If so, clever.

item.title: RUA Rules Of Autoing!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Well I found some rules for autoing on the SRL Forums. So I wanted to write some out in my own words.
EDIT - Thanks Greeny

Have you ever wanted an autoing army? Have you got one? You need to read the rules of autoing!

[center][size=35pt].::Golden Rules For Autoing::.[/size][/center]

[size=15pt]1#[/size]
Respect Jagex.

This community respects Jackex. We enjoy playing their game, not for the game, but for the intellectual challenge. We play somewhat different than legitimite players, but we try to act natural.

[size=20pt]2#[/size]
Thou shall take care of his autoing army.

Cherish your players. Treat your players with respect, treat them as individuals. They are your Army, they work for you. Don't leave them unattended.

[size=15pt]3#[/size]
Switch players often
If you switch players 30 minutes to 45 minutes, you won’t get so many randoms!

[size=15pt]4#[/size]
Is my Army an army?
Make sure you have more than 15 players to auto on, It’s not really an autoing army if you have 5> players to run on.

[size=15pt]5#[/size]
Try to stay on-line as long as possible
Don’t you just love scripts that go on for 24+ hours? Try to keep autoing for as long as possible. but not up to the point until you think that you should stop to keep accounts safe

[size=15pt]6#[/size]
Create your own!!
You know if you want to have a good autoing army that makes you millions and none are banned, your gonna need some good scripts right? If you use other peoples scripts there going to stop updating, the script will brake, or it will get outdated. Learn SCAR and then you can have an army of scripts! Don’t forget to release previous versions! You could become a great SCAR scripter!

[size=20pt]7#[/size]
Learn from your mistakes
Most people say this but you have to learn from your mistakes, you could of fucked up in scripting a script, getting one line wrong could fuck your autoing up! I don’t mean an error in a script but something that’s old and outdated, it might work but it could be detectable.

[size=15pt]8#[/size]
Use more Computers!
Try to use multiple computers, if you only have 1 good one of your own then install VM ware and auto with tin xp! (I’ll make a tutorial soon) Multiple computers means multiple scripts, more scripts means more accounts! SCAR would boot aryan off the ledge!

[size=15pt]9#[/size]
Keep up-to-date!
If a new version of SCAR comes out, install it, don’t delete the previous version you might need it! If a new SRL comes out, INSTALL IT! Update your scripts constantly so if your using low version of things and poor scripts you can only get better.

[size=15pt]10#[/size]
Have fun!
Remember why we’re here? We’re here to have fun, auto, play runescape, do what you want with SCAR but remember runescape needs you!

Read full topic
